ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Jose, thanks for the info. Since I m a bear myself, I think I ll venture over and say hi to guild on lanys, as well as rodcet. I m looking forward to
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Jose, thanks for the info. Since I'm a bear myself,
I think I'll venture over and say hi to guild on
lanys, as well as rodcet. I'm looking forward to
talking to everyone.

Deanir


--- Jose Muela <redspieder@...> wrote:
> Welcome!! glad to have you with us :) just FYI our
> largest glbt guild is on
> Rodcet Nife, we also have glbt guilds on various
> other servers and there is
> a bear guild on the lanys t'vyl server callled ordo
> ursi prismatus, the gblt
> guild on rodcet is called mystic allyance feel free
> to come on over to
> either of those two or any of the others and say hi
> :)
>
>
> >From: deanir@...
> >Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
> >To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
> >Date: Wed, 31 Jan 2001 22:37:52 -0000
> >
> >Hello everyone,
> >
> >I've just joined the mailing list and am very
> excited to have found
> >this group. I've been looking for a long time for
> other gays in the EQ
> >world. I currently play on The Seventh Hammer sever
> with my main
> >character Deanir a lvl 38 dwarf cleric. I only know
> of 5 other gay
> >players on the server, 4 of which I know in RL.
> >If there are any other people who play on The
> Seventh Hammer server do
> >send me a /tell and say hi.
> >
> >Deanir DerKleriker
> >Seventh Hammer
> >
> >
>
>
